original_text:
Legend of Cleopatra

Il provider Playson ci presenta una delle slot online gratis a tema egiziano più popolari tra gli appassionati di questo genere: Legend of Cleopatra. L’obiettivo del gioco è molto semplice, dovrai tentare di sbloccare gli enigmi delle piramidi per trovare jolly e preziosi simboli scatter nascosti.
Gameplay insolito
Il design di Legend of Cleopatra, una slot online a 6 rulli, è davvero ben fatto: le bobine sono posizionate all’interno di una camera da bagno del palazzo di Cleopatra. Vedrai subito carte da gioco posizionate vicino al Dio degli uccelli Ra, al Dio gatto Bastet e al Dio cane Anubi. Tutti pagano 2 volte e mezzo la puntata totale se ne ottieni 6 di fila. Il vero elemento distintivo che rende questa slot gratis unica, è il motore di gioco insolito: l’azione infatti, si svolge su un set di rulli 2x3x3x4x5x5 che raggiunge fino a 100 linee di pagamento. Con questo insolito set di mulinelli, Legend of Cleopatra potrebbe sembrarti un gioco complicato, in realtà, è molto semplice. La grafica è ben fatta e la colonna sonora crea un’atmosfera misteriosa che si adatta molto bene alla trama. Anche la gamma di extra è soddisfacente seppur senza presentare caratteristiche particolarmente innovative.
Simboli principali
I simboli standard più pagati sono:

Cleopatra e il logo della leggenda di Cleopatra che paga 3,75 volte la puntata se ottieni una combinazione di 6 simboli,
Un simbolo Wild dorato che sostituisce tutto, tranne lo scatter e paga fino a 5 volte la puntata per linea di pagamento.

Funzionalità extra

Occhio alla bobina numero 4 bordata in oro! Se riesci a riempirla con un jolly impilato, attiverai la funzione Double Wild Reel. Un rullo viene scelto a caso e riempito di jolly per darti due rulli jolly. Cerca i jolly in pila che possono essere duplicati su una seconda bobina e un round bonus che assegna fino a 30 giri gratuiti. Gioca su tutti i dispositivi tra 0,20€ fino a 100,00€ per giro.
La seconda caratteristica è la funzione Free Spins – Durante questa funzione, la forma delle bobine viene invertita in una formazione 5x5x4x3x3x2. L’atterraggio di 2 scatter scarabeo aggiunge altri 2 giri gratuiti al tuo totale. Puoi arrivare ad accumulare fino a 30 free spins in totale.

Se dopo aver provato Legend of Cleopatra vuoi giocare con qualche altra slot gratuita con il tema dell’Antico Egitto non ti resta che selezionare dal nostro elenco i titoli: Cleopatra, Cleopatra 2 e Cleopatra PLus del provider IGT. Se vuoi sentirti come un vero faraone puoi giocare con soldi veri ed aggiudicarti subito un fantastico bonus deposito!

raw_translation.response:
Legend of Cleopatra

Playson presents one of the most popular Egyptian-themed online slot games among fans of this genre: Legend of Cleopatra. The objective of the game is very simple, you must try to unlock the pyramid enigmas to find hidden wilds and valuable scatter symbols.

Unusual Gameplay

The design of Legend of Cleopatra, a 6-reel online slot, is really well done: the reels are positioned inside a bathroom in Cleopatra's palace. You'll immediately see playing cards positioned near the bird god Ra, the cat goddess Bastet, and the dog god Anubis. All pay 2 and a half times the total bet if you get 6 in a row. The real distinctive element that makes this free slot game unique is the unusual game engine: the action takes place on a set of reels 2x3x3x4x5x5 that reaches up to 100 paylines. With this unusual set of reels, Legend of Cleopatra may seem like a complicated game, but in reality, it's very simple. The graphics are well done, and the soundtrack creates a mysterious atmosphere that fits the storyline very well. Even the range of extras is satisfactory, although without particularly innovative features.

Main Symbols

The highest paying standard symbols are:

Cleopatra and the Legend of Cleopatra logo, which pays 3.75 times the bet if you get a combination of 6 symbols,
A golden wild symbol that replaces everything except the scatter and pays up to 5 times the bet per payline.

Extra Features

Keep an eye on reel number 4 edged in gold! If you can fill it with a stacked wild, you will activate the Double Wild Reel feature. A reel is randomly selected and filled with wilds to give you two wild reels. Look for stacked wilds that can be duplicated on a second reel and a bonus round that awards up to 30 free spins. Play on all devices from €0.20 up to €100.00 per spin.

The second feature is the Free Spins function - During this feature, the shape of the reels is reversed in a 5x5x4x3x3x2 formation. Landing 2 scarab scatters adds another 2 free spins to your total. You can accumulate up to 30 free spins in total.

If after trying Legend of Cleopatra you want to play with some other free slots with the theme of Ancient Egypt, all you have to do is select from our list the titles: Cleopatra, Cleopatra 2 and Cleopatra Plus from the provider IGT. If you want to feel like a true pharaoh, you can play with real money and instantly win a fantastic deposit bonus!

Review: Legend of Cleopatra

The provider Playson presents one of the most popular free online slots with an Egyptian theme among fans of this genre: Legend of Cleopatra. The game's objective is very simple, you have to try to unlock the mysteries of the pyramids to find wilds and valuable hidden scatter symbols.

Unusual gameplay

The design of Legend of Cleopatra, a 6-reel online slot, is really well done: the reels are located inside a bathroom of Cleopatra's palace. You will immediately see playing cards positioned next to the bird god Ra, the cat god Bastet, and the dog god Anubis. They all pay 2 and a half times the total bet if you get 6 in a row. The real distinctive element that makes this unique free slot is the unusual game engine: the action takes place on a set of reels 2x3x3x4x5x5 that reaches up to 100 paylines. With this unusual set of reels, Legend of Cleopatra may seem like a complicated game, but in reality, it is very simple. The graphics are well done, and the soundtrack creates a mysterious atmosphere that fits the plot very well. Even the range of extras is satisfying, although without presenting particularly innovative features.

Main symbols

The highest-paying standard symbols are:

Cleopatra and the Legend of Cleopatra logo that pays 3.75 times the bet if you get a combination of 6 symbols,
A golden wild symbol that substitutes for everything except the scatter and pays up to 5 times the bet per payline.

Extra features

Keep an eye on reel number 4 bordered in gold! If you manage to fill it with a stacked wild, you will activate the Double Wild Reel feature. A reel is randomly chosen and filled with wilds to give you two wild reels. Look for stacked wilds that can be duplicated on a second reel and a bonus round that awards up to 30 free spins. Play on all devices from €0.20 up to €100.00 per spin.
The second feature is the Free Spins feature - During this feature, the shape of the reels is reversed into a 5x5x4x3x3x2 formation. Landing 2 scarab scatters adds another 2 free spins to your total. You can accumulate up to 30 free spins in total.

If after trying Legend of Cleopatra you want to play with some other free slots with the theme of ancient Egypt, all you have to do is select titles from our list: Cleopatra, Cleopatra 2, and Cleopatra Plus from the provider IGT. response.headline: Symbols and Extra Features: When Cleopatra Goes Wild!
response.content:
Hold onto your headdresses! Legend of Cleopatra features a golden wild symbol that can substitute for everything except for the scatter symbol. And it'll pay up to 5 times the bet per payline! But that's not all: if you manage to fill reel number 4 with a stacked wild, you can activate the Double Wild Reel feature. What is that, you ask? Only the chance to have a randomly chosen reel become filled with wilds, giving you not one but two wild reels! And perhaps it's her famous duplicity, but Cleopatra has a stacked symbol on the main game, with the possibility of duplicating a second reel, leading to a bonus round that can award you up to 30 free spins.

But that's not the only free spins feature. During the Free Spins feature, the reels take on a 5x5x4x3x3x2 formation, boggling even the most math-savvy. You can score up to 30 free spins here, and even landing just 2 scarab scatters will add another 2 free spins to the total. Looks like those bugs do have some use after all!

Unusual gameplay

The design of Legend of Cleopatra, a 6-reel online slot, is really well done: the reels are located inside a bathroom of Cleopatra's palace. You will immediately see playing cards positioned next to the bird god Ra, the cat god Bastet, and the dog god Anubis. They all pay 2 and a half times the total bet if you get 6 in a row. The real distinctive element that makes this unique free slot is the unusual game engine: the action takes place on a set of reels 2x3x3x4x5x5 that reaches up to 100 paylines. With this unusual set of reels, Legend of Cleopatra may seem like a complicated game, but in reality, it is very simple. The graphics are well done, and the soundtrack creates a mysterious atmosphere that fits the plot very well. Even the range of extras is satisfying, although without presenting particularly innovative features.

Main symbols

The highest-paying standard symbols are:

Cleopatra and the Legend of Cleopatra logo that pays 3.75 times the bet if you get a combination of 6 symbols,
A golden wild symbol that substitutes for everything except the scatter and pays up to 5 times the bet per payline.

Extra features

Keep an eye on reel number 4 bordered in gold! If you manage to fill it with a stacked wild, you will activate the Double Wild Reel feature. A reel is randomly chosen and filled with wilds to give you two wild reels. Look for stacked wilds that can be duplicated on a second reel and a bonus round that awards up to 30 free spins. Play on all devices from €0.20 up to €100.00 per spin.
The second feature is the Free Spins feature - During this feature, the shape of the reels is reversed into a 5x5x4x3x3x2 formation. Landing 2 scarab scatters adds another 2 free spins to your total. You can accumulate up to 30 free spins in total.

If after trying Legend of Cleopatra you want to play with some other free slots with the theme of ancient Egypt, all you have to do is select titles from our list: Cleopatra, Cleopatra 2, and Cleopatra Plus from the provider IGT. If you want to feel like a true pharaoh, you can play with real money and immediately win a fantastic deposit bonus!
